meta.name: AI-powered Candidate Screening & Interview Scheduling with OpenAI GPT & Google Suite

nodes.name: Webhook - Receive Application
nodes.notes:
ğŸ“¥ ENTRY POINT

This webhook receives job applications from candidates.

Expected data:
- Candidate Name
- Email
- Phone
- Resume (URL or text)
- Cover Letter
- Years of Experience
- Skills

URL: https://your-n8n-instance.com/webhook/job-application

parameters.content:
## ğŸ“‹ Workflow Overview

This workflow automates the complete recruitment process:

1ï¸âƒ£ Receive applications via webhook
2ï¸âƒ£ Store in database/spreadsheet
3ï¸âƒ£ AI evaluates candidate fit
4ï¸âƒ£ Score and rank candidates
5ï¸âƒ£ Send notifications
6ï¸âƒ£ Schedule interviews for qualified candidates

**Role:** Automation Specialist
**AI Used:** OpenAI GPT for evaluation

nodes.name: Google Sheets - Store Application
nodes.notes:
ğŸ’¾ DATA STORAGE

Stores all application data in Google Sheets for:
- Easy tracking and management
- Historical record keeping
- Team collaboration
- Backup of all applications

Alternative: Can use Airtable, PostgreSQL, or MySQL instead

parameters.content:
## ğŸ“Š Database Storage

Applications are stored with:
- Timestamp
- Contact information
- Experience details
- Skills list
- Resume link
- Current status

This creates an applicant tracking system (ATS)

nodes.name: OpenAI - AI Candidate Evaluation
nodes.notes:
ğŸ¤– AI EVALUATION ENGINE

Uses GPT-4 to:
- Analyze candidate qualifications
- Match skills against job requirements
- Identify strengths and gaps
- Provide objective scoring (0-100)
- Generate hiring recommendation

Benefits:
- Consistent evaluation criteria
- Unbiased initial screening
- Faster processing
- Detailed insights

values.content:
=Your name is Rayan and you are an expert technical recruiter evaluating candidates for an Automation Specialist position.

Job Requirements:
- 3+ years of experience in automation
- Strong skills in n8n, Make.com, or Zapier
- Programming: Python, JavaScript
- API integration experience
- Workflow design expertise
- Problem-solving abilities

Candidate Information:
Name: {{ $json.body.name }}
Experience: {{ $json.body.experience }} years
Skills: {{ $json.body.skills }}
Resume Summary: {{ $json.body.resume }}

Evaluate this candidate and provide:
1. Overall Score (0-100)
2. Strengths (3-5 points)
3. Weaknesses (2-3 points)
4. Recommendation (Strong Hire / Hire / Maybe / Reject)
5. Key concerns or highlights

Format your response as JSON:
{
  "score": 85,
  "recommendation": "Hire",
  "strengths": ["..."],
  "weaknesses": ["..."],
  "summary": "..."
}

parameters.content:
## ğŸ§  AI Evaluation

The AI analyzes:
âœ“ Experience level match
âœ“ Technical skills alignment
âœ“ Automation tool proficiency
âœ“ Programming capabilities
âœ“ Overall candidate fit

Output: Structured evaluation report

nodes.name: Code - Process Evaluation
nodes.notes:
âš™ï¸ DATA PROCESSING

This node:
- Parses AI evaluation response
- Extracts structured data (score, recommendation)
- Combines candidate + evaluation data
- Determines next step (Interview or Reject)
- Handles errors gracefully

Threshold: Score â‰¥ 70 â†’ Interview

nodes.name: IF - Check Score Threshold
nodes.notes:
ğŸ”€ DECISION POINT

Routes candidates based on evaluation:

âœ… TRUE (Score â‰¥ 70):
- Send interview invitation
- Schedule meeting
- Update status to 'Interview Scheduled'

âŒ FALSE (Score < 70):
- Send rejection email
- Update status to 'Rejected'
- Archive application

parameters.content:
## ğŸ¯ Scoring Logic

Score â‰¥ 70: Qualified for interview
Score < 70: Not a fit

This threshold can be adjusted based on:
- Role requirements
- Application volume
- Hiring urgency

nodes.name: Email - Interview Invitation
nodes.notes:
âœ‰ï¸ INTERVIEW INVITATION

Sends personalized email to qualified candidates:
- Congratulatory message
- Evaluation highlights
- Next steps information
- Request for confirmation

Alternative: Use SendGrid, Gmail, or Outlook node

parameters.text:
=Dear {{ $json.candidate.name }},

Congratulations! We were impressed with your application for the Automation Specialist position.

Evaluation Summary:
- Overall Score: {{ $json.evaluation.score }}/100
- Recommendation: {{ $json.evaluation.recommendation }}

Strengths:
{{ $json.evaluation.strengths.join('\n- ') }}

We would like to invite you for an interview. Our team will reach out shortly to schedule a convenient time.

Please reply to confirm your continued interest.

Best regards,
HR Team
parameters.subject: Interview Invitation - Automation Specialist Position

nodes.name: Email - Rejection Notice
nodes.notes:
âœ‰ï¸ REJECTION NOTICE

Sends professional rejection email:
- Respectful and kind tone
- Thanks candidate for interest
- Encourages future applications
- Maintains company reputation

Best practice: Always send closure to candidates

parameters.text:
=Dear {{ $json.candidate.name }},

Thank you for your interest in the Automation Specialist position at our company.

After careful review of your application, we have decided to move forward with other candidates whose experience more closely matches our current requirements.

We appreciate the time you invested in your application and encourage you to apply for future opportunities that align with your skills.

We wish you the best in your job search.

Best regards,
HR Team
parameters.subject: Application Update - Automation Specialist Position

nodes.name: Google Calendar - Schedule Interview
nodes.notes:
ğŸ“… INTERVIEW SCHEDULING

Automatically creates calendar event:
- Scheduled 3 days in advance
- 1-hour duration
- Includes candidate details
- Adds evaluation summary
- Invites candidate + hiring manager
- Sends calendar invites

Alternative: Use Calendly API integration

parameters.content:
## ğŸ“§ Email Notifications

Two paths:

1ï¸âƒ£ HIGH SCORE:
- Interview invitation
- Positive feedback
- Schedule interview

2ï¸âƒ£ LOW SCORE:
- Professional rejection
- Kind closure
- Future encouragement

nodes.name: Update Sheet - Interview Status
nodes.notes:
ğŸ“ STATUS UPDATE - INTERVIEW

Updates Google Sheet with:
- Status: 'Interview Scheduled'
- AI evaluation score
- Recommendation level
- Interview date

This keeps the ATS current for HR team tracking

nodes.name: Update Sheet - Rejection Status
nodes.notes:
ğŸ“ STATUS UPDATE - REJECTION

Updates Google Sheet with:
- Status: 'Rejected'
- AI evaluation score
- Recommendation (for records)
- Rejection date

Maintains complete audit trail

nodes.name: Respond to Webhook
nodes.notes:
ğŸ“¤ WEBHOOK RESPONSE

Sends confirmation back to application form:
- Success status
- Confirmation message
- Processing status

This closes the webhook connection and confirms receipt to the applicant

parameters.content:
## ğŸ‰ Workflow Complete!

Final steps:
1. Status updated in database
2. Emails sent to candidate
3. Calendar scheduled (if interview)
4. Response sent to form

**Metrics to Track:**
- Applications received
- Average AI score
- Interview rate
- Time to process

## ğŸ”§ Configuration Required

**Environment Variables:**
- GOOGLE_SHEET_ID: Your Google Sheet ID

**Credentials Needed:**
1. Google Sheets OAuth2
2. OpenAI API Key
3. SMTP Email Account
4. Google Calendar OAuth2

**Customize:**
- Job requirements in AI prompt
- Score threshold (currently 70)
- Email templates
- Interview scheduling time
